name: Ditch The Snitch PRO
description:
"I open at the close."

The snitch has arrived. They say getting the snitch makes you win instantly.

Or does it?


Are you up to the challenge? How much time can you last before the snitches annihilate you?


Let's find out!


-No micro transactions, No IAP, no crippled gameplay, no data requirements.
-From an indie game developer who loves creating.
-Its difficult. And You'll love it.
-Game runs on all iPhones (3GS, 4, 4s, 5, 5s, 5c, 6s, 6, 6 Plus, 6s Plus, SE, 7, 7 Plus) running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
-Game runs on all iPod Touches (3rd gen, 4th gen, 5th gen, 6th gen) running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility
-Game runs on all iPads running iOS 5.1.1 or higher for wide compatibility

Beat the timer!
Beat the scores of your friends!
Enjoy!
